title: Web Development
description: Custom web applications built with modern frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular. Full-stack development including backend APIs and database design.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. React Native and Flutter development with focus on user experience.

title: Cloud Solutions
description: Scalable cloud infrastructure setup and deployment. AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure expertise for reliable and cost-effective solutions.

title: UI/UX Design
description: User-centered design approach creating intuitive interfaces. Wireframing, prototyping, and design system development.
